source_data.description: Rating arabic handwriting, in this course we will explore the key criteria used to evaluate and improve Arabic handwriting. Arabic script requires clarity, balance, and proper letter formation, making handwriting assessment essential for both students and professionals. This course will teach how to analyze handwriting based on legibility, consistency, spacing, alignment, and connection of letters. You will learn common handwriting mistakes, techniques for enhancement, and grading methods used in education and professional settings. We will also cover handwriting styles, calligraphy basics, and digital handwriting recognition. Through practical exercises, comparisons, and guided feedback, you will develop the skills to rate and refine Arabic handwriting effectively. Whether you're a teacher, student, or handwriting enthusiast, this course will help you evaluate and enhance Arabic handwriting with confidence. Arabic With Amina
